summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: the hero headline/subheadline are updated to the specified exact text (via marketingContent), and the hero CTA area renders a single TanStack Router <Link> button labeled "Get started" that navigates to /plans. Some additional non-requested file updates are present (project metadata/summaries).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/metadata file without being requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for Home hero text + CTA changes and includes constraints/non-goals; it does not request updating project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated generated file summary content without being requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention updating documentation/summary artifacts; only Home hero content/CTA should change.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed/introduced navigation CTA text "Get Started" in marketing content (potentially affecting TopNav or other areas beyond the Home hero).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1/REQ-2 are limited to the Home page hero copy and hero CTA buttons; changing global nav CTA text is not requested and could affect other pages/components.
